title: The Gemini Reign
description: Once the school day was over, I walked to the school's main door, but before I could get to the door someone walked in. He was wearing a black leather jacket over a white shirt and blue jeans. He had blonde hair and striking blue eyes that bore into me.  Justin. Her world changed overnight... "I know your kind, you lie to protect yourselves?" He said it with a sneer. My kind? Is he insane? Did he mean... "Do you mean you're not human?" I couldn't believe I just said that. This time he was the one furrowing his eyebrows, "Human? You are not human.?" What?
author: Laeba Mujeeb
